chunk_text: Done at Strasbourg, 5 April 2017. For the European Parliament The President A. TAJANI For the Council The President I. BORG (1) OJ L 347, 20.12.2013, p. 855. (2) OJ C 373, 20.12.2013, p. 1. (3) Regulation (EC) No 546/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 2009 amending Regulation (EC) No 1927/2006 on establishing the European Globalisation Adjustment Fund (OJ L 167, 29.6.2009, p. 26). (4) Council Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 1311/2013 of 2 December 2013 laying down the multiannual financial framework for the years 2014-2020 (OJ L 347, 20.12.2013, p. 884).
